About.title: About Us
About.description: We take full responsibility for the delivery of your shipment, giving you more time to focus on important matters. Amanati postal and courier service operates throughout Georgia. We are creating a modern, technological, and convenient service for businesses. Our goal is to save our customers time and simplify their daily routine through our service, which ensures the safe and prompt delivery of shipments to their destination.

question1.title: How do I place an order?
question1.answer: Yes, you can use it for free for 30 days. If you wish, I can offer you a free, personalized 30-minute introductory call to get you started as quickly as possible.

question2.title: Can you change your subscription later?
question2.answer: Our standard delivery time is 24-48 hours.

question3.title: What are the terms for canceling my service?
question3.answer: Payment for the order can be made online or through the courier.

question4.title: Can you add additional details to my invoice?
question4.answer: Yes, you can add additional details to your invoice.

question5.title: What is your privacy policy?
question5.answer: We respect the privacy of our customers' personal information.

question6.title: How can I update the email associated with my account?
question6.answer: You can contact us via email or phone.
